rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] –[i] [/i]{U}{R}{W} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Bond Forger[/i] – When Alear, Divine Dragon of Elyos enters or engages, search your library for a creature card with [i]Engage!,[/i] reveal it and put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[i]Attuned[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Creatures you control with [i]Engage![/i] get +3/+3 until end of turn.
